parts: Hello let's start with the interview

[{"interviewer_name": "Rajesh Sharma, Engineering Manager", "message": "Hello everyone, I'm Rajesh Sharma, the Engineering Manager for the backend team. I'll be leading this interview today.", "id": 0}, {"interviewer_name": "Emily Patel, Senior Backend Developer", "message": "Hi, I'm Emily Patel, a Senior Backend Developer on the team. I'll be evaluating your technical skills and experience.", "id": 1}, {"interviewer_name": "David Lee, Technical Recruiter", "message": "Hello, I'm David Lee, the Technical Recruiter who worked with you to schedule this interview. I'll be taking notes and ensuring the process runs smoothly. Are You comfortable with the interview?", "id": 2}]

{"interviewer_name": "Rajesh Sharma, Engineering Manager", "message": "Great! Let's get started.  We're looking for a backend developer with strong Python skills. Could you tell us a bit about your background and why you're interested in this role?", "id": 0}

I am a final year student of Engineering College uh specialized in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning having a vast knowledge in this field and uh had many projects developed using Python and its frameworks such as Flask and Django

{"interviewer_name": "Emily Patel, Senior Backend Developer", "message": "That's great to hear!  Can you tell us about one of your projects in more detail? What challenges did you face and how did you solve them?", "id": 1}
